Notes: An area that can be used to overwrite the galaxy's shadow far clipping settings when entered by the player.

Obj_arg0.Name: Far Clipping Distance
Obj_arg0.Description: The far clipping distance to be used for all shadows. Default is 7000 or the value provided by the galaxy's ShadowControllerParam file.

Obj_arg1.Name: Enable Far Clipping?
Obj_arg1.Description: If set, far clipping will be enabled for all shadows.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

BaseMtxFollower.Description: Objects of this class can follow another BaseMtxFollowTarget object.
